```{r}
#Read files

sales_data_mod_a2020 <- read.csv("sales_data_mod_a2020.csv")
sales_data_mod_b2020 <- read.csv("sales_data_mod_b2020.csv")

head(sales_data_mod_a2020)

```


```{r}
sales_data_mod_a2020$month <- format(as.Date(sales_data_mod_a2020$zillow_month_day),"%m")
nlag = 4
sales_data_mod_a2020_lag <- sales_data_mod_a2020%>%group_by(zillow_zip)%>%arrange(desc(zillow_month_day))%>%mutate(zillow_sales_value_index_lag = lag(zillow_sales_value_index, n = nlag),zillow_month_day_lag = lag(zillow_month_day, n = nlag))


sales_data_mod_a2020_lag <- sales_data_mod_a2020_lag%>%mutate(zillow_month_day_lag = ifelse(!is.na(zillow_sales_value_index_lag), zillow_month_day_lag, format(ceiling_date(as.Date(zillow_month_day), "month") + months(nlag) - days(1),"%Y-%m-%d") ))%>%arrange(zillow_zip,zillow_month_day)

tail(sales_data_mod_a2020_lag%>%filter(zillow_zip == 10001)%>%select(zillow_month_day,zillow_month_day_lag,zillow_sales_value_index,zillow_sales_value_index_lag, outlier),nlag*2)


```

```{r}
list_columns <- colnames(sales_data_mod_a2020_lag)
filter_columns = list_columns[grepl("^comp_ratio*|^zillow_sales_value_index|var_zip|^month", list_columns)]
filter_columns = filter_columns[!filter_columns %in% c("month_number","zillow_sales_value_index")]
df_lma2020_low_lag <- sales_data_mod_a2020_lag%>%filter(outlier==0)%>%filter(income_group=="low")%>%filter(!is.na(zillow_sales_value_index_lag))%>%select(filter_columns)
lma2020_low_lag <- lm(zillow_sales_value_index_lag ~ .-zillow_zip, data=df_lma2020_low_lag)  

print("Adjusted R square:")
summary(lma2020_low_lag)$adj.r.squared
print("FStatistic:")
summary(lma2020_low_lag)$fstatistic

print("Number of significant variables:")
nrow(data.frame(summary(lma2020_low_lag)$coefficients)%>%filter(.[[4]] <0.05))
print("Largest coefficients:")
head(data.frame(summary(lma2020_low_lag)$coefficients)%>%filter(.[[4]] <0.05)%>% arrange(desc(abs(Estimate))),20)
sel_columns_lma2020_low_lag <- row.names(data.frame(summary(lma2020_low_lag)$coefficients)%>%filter(.[[4]] <0.05))

```

```{r}
df_lma2020_low_lag_opt <- sales_data_mod_a2020_lag%>%filter(outlier==0)%>%filter(income_group=="low")%>%filter(!is.na(zillow_sales_value_index_lag))%>%select(c(sel_columns_lma2020_low_lag[!grepl("var_zip|^month|*Intercept*",sel_columns_lma2020_low_lag)],var_zip,month,zillow_sales_value_index_lag,zillow_month_day_lag))

lma2020_low_lag_opt <- lm(zillow_sales_value_index_lag ~ . -zillow_zip, data=df_lma2020_low_lag_opt%>%select(!zillow_month_day_lag))

print("Adjusted R square:")
summary(lma2020_low_lag_opt)$adj.r.squared
print("FStatistic:")
summary(lma2020_low_lag_opt)$fstatistic

print("Number of significant variables:")
nrow(data.frame(summary(lma2020_low_lag_opt)$coefficients))
print("Largest coefficients:")
data.frame(summary(lma2020_low_lag_opt)$coefficients)%>% arrange(desc(abs(Estimate)))
print("Complaint coefficients:")
data.frame(summary(lma2020_low_lag_opt)$coefficients)[sel_columns_lma2020_low_lag[grepl("comp_ratio|Intercept",sel_columns_lma2020_low_lag)],]%>% arrange(desc(abs(Estimate)))

dfpred_lma2020_low_lag_opt <- sales_data_mod_a2020_lag%>%filter(outlier==0)%>%filter(income_group=="low")%>%select(c(sel_columns_lma2020_low_lag[!grepl("var_zip|^month|*Intercept*",sel_columns_lma2020_low_lag)],var_zip,month,zillow_sales_value_index_lag,zillow_month_day_lag))

tail(dfpred_lma2020_low_lag_opt)

dfpred_lma2020_low_lag_opt$prediction <- predict(lma2020_low_lag_opt, newdata=dfpred_lma2020_low_lag_opt%>%select(!zillow_month_day_lag))

ggplot(data = dfpred_lma2020_low_lag_opt%>%select(zillow_month_day_lag, prediction, zillow_sales_value_index_lag),aes(x = as.Date(zillow_month_day_lag))) + 
  stat_summary(aes(y = prediction, colour = "Forecasted Index (n+4)"),geom = "line", fun = "mean", size= 1) +
  stat_summary(aes(y = prediction),geom = "ribbon", fun.data = "mean_cl_normal", alpha = 0.1,fill = "red") +
  stat_summary(aes(y=zillow_sales_value_index_lag, colour = "Actual Index"), geom = "line", fun = "mean", size= 1) +
  stat_summary(aes(y = zillow_sales_value_index_lag),geom = "ribbon", fun.data = "mean_cl_normal", alpha = 0.1,fill = "blue") +
  scale_colour_manual("", 
                      breaks = c("Forecasted Index (n+4)", "Actual Index"),
                      values = c("red", "blue")) +
  xlab("Date")+
  ylab("Sales Zillow Home Value Index")+
  ggtitle("2021-2023 Zillow Home Value Time Series \n Low income areas - Forecast (n+4) vs Predicted")



```
